languages.text: "Замена людей на сервиторов — предприятие, которое под силу только крупному миру-кузне. Остальным приходится мириться с людскими слабостями".
"Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."
languages.original_text: "Замена людей на сервиторов — предприятие, которое под силу только крупному миру-кузне. Остальным приходится мириться с людскими слабостями".

traits.locale_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “只有大型铸造世界才有能力将所有的人类改造为机仆，至于我们其他人，只能将就着与人性的弱点共存。”
languages.original_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."

traits.locale_text: “只有大型铸造世界才有能力将所有的人类改造为奴工，至于我们其他人，只能将就着与人性的弱点共存。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Il n'y a que sur les mondes forges majeurs que tous les humains peuvent être remplacés par des servitors. Nous, en revanche, n'avons d'autre choix que de faire avec les faiblesses humaines. »
languages.original_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a que sur les mondes forges majeurs que tous les humains peuvent être remplacés par des servitors. Nous, en revanche, n'avons d'autre choix que de faire avec les faiblesses humaines. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Alle Menschen durch Servitoren zu ersetzen, das könnte nur eine große Fabrikwelt implementieren. Wir anderen müssen mit menschlichen Schwächen leben."
languages.original_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."

traits.locale_text: "Alle Menschen durch Servitoren zu ersetzen, das könnte nur eine große Fabrikwelt implementieren. Wir anderen müssen mit menschlichen Schwächen leben."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「人間すべてをサーヴィターにするというのは、大規模工業惑星だけでよい。残りの人間は、人間の弱さを持ち合わせておくべきだ」
languages.original_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."

traits.locale_text: 「人間すべてをサーヴィターにするというのは、大規模工業惑星だけでよい。残りの人間は、人間の弱さを持ち合わせておくべきだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Sustituir a todos los humanos por servidores es algo que solo un mundo forja importante podría implementar. El resto debemos conformarnos con las fragilidades humanas».
languages.original_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."

traits.locale_text: «Sustituir a todos los humanos por servidores es algo que solo un mundo forja importante podría implementar. El resto debemos conformarnos con las fragilidades humanas».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Her insanın yerine hizmetör getirmek, yalnızca dev bir döküm dünyasının üstesinden gelebileceği bir zorluktur. Bizim gibi buna erişimi olmayanlar, insanlığın zaaflarına katlanmalıdır."
languages.original_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."

traits.locale_text: "Her insanın yerine servitör getirmek, yalnızca dev bir döküm dünyasının üstesinden gelebileceği bir zorluktur. Bizim gibi buna erişimi olmayanlar, insanlığın zaaflarına katlanmalıdır."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Replacing all humans with servitors is something only a major forge world could implement. The rest of us have to make do with human frailties."
